oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Expedient Total Synthesis of (-)-Cladospolide A
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KALIAPPAN, KP
SI, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: closing metathesis approach
cladosporium-cladosporioides
phytotoxic macrolide
asymmetric-synthesis
olefin metathesis
chiral sulfoxides
b-ring
efficient
strategy
route
olefin cross metathesis
julia-kocienski olefination

cladospolides
total synthesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple and efficient total synthesis of (-)-cladospolide A is described here, which involves either olefin cross metathesis or Julia-Kocienski olefination and Yamaguchi macrolactonization as key steps.
